org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Interface TopologyRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseClusterRequest, ExportBlueprintRequest, ProvisionClusterRequest, ScaleClusterRequest

    public interface TopologyRequest
    A request which is used to create or modify a cluster topology.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TopologyRequest.Type
      Request types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Blueprint getBlueprint()
      Get the blueprint instance associated with the request.
      Long getClusterId()
      Get the cluster id associated with the request.
      Configuration getConfiguration()
      Get the cluster scoped configuration for the request.
      String getDescription()
      Get request description.
      Map<String,HostGroupInfo> getHostGroupInfo()
      Get host group info.
      TopologyRequest.Type getType()
      Get the request type.

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterId

        Long getClusterId()
        Get the cluster id associated with the request. Can be null.
        Returns:
        associated cluster id

      • getType

        TopologyRequest.Type getType()
        Get the request type.
        Returns:
        the type of request

      • getBlueprint

        Get the blueprint instance associated with the request.
        Returns:

        Get the cluster scoped configuration for the request.
        Returns:
        cluster scoped configuration

      • getHostGroupInfo

        Map<String,HostGroupInfo> getHostGroupInfo()
        Get host group info.
        Returns:
        map of host group name to group info

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Get request description.
        Returns:
        string description of the request
